about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Pet Care Partner Since 2010

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Paws & Love Pet Shop was founded in 2010 with a simple mission: to help pets find loving homes and provide the best care products and services. Over the years, we have helped thousands of pets find their forever families and have become a trusted name in pet care.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe every pet deserves love, care, and a safe home. Our mission is to connect pets with loving families while providing quality products and services to keep them healthy and happy.

values.title: Our Values
values.compassionDesc: We treat every pet with love and care
values.qualityDesc: We only offer the best products and services
values.trustDesc: We build lasting relationships with our customers
values.communityDesc: We support local animal welfare initiatives

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate pet lovers dedicated to your pet's wellbeing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.a1: Our adoption process includes filling out an application, meeting the pet, and a home check. The process usually takes 3-5 days.
questions.q2: Do you offer delivery for products?
questions.a2: Yes, we offer free delivery for orders over $50 within the city. Standard delivery takes 2-3 business days.
questions.a3: We offer grooming, boarding, veterinary checkups, and training services. All services are provided by certified professionals.
questions.a4: Yes, unused products can be returned within 14 days with original packaging. Food items cannot be returned once opened.
questions.q5: Do I need to book services in advance?
questions.a5: We recommend booking at least 24 hours in advance, especially for grooming and boarding services. Same-day appointments may be available.
questions.q6: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a6: We accept credit cards, debit cards, cash, and mobile payments. For online orders, we accept all major credit cards.
